meanings.definition: Making jokes or sarcastic remarks in a clever and humorous way.
meanings.sent1: The wisecracking comedian had the audience laughing all night.
meanings.sent2: She is known for her wisecracking sense of humor.
meanings.sent3: The wisecracking student always lightens the mood in class.
meanings.sent4: His wisecracking wit was as sharp as a knife.
meanings.sent5: The wisecracking banter between friends was infectious.

meanings.definition: A person who makes jokes or sarcastic remarks in a clever and humorous way.
meanings.sent1: The wisecracking in the movie made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent2: He was the wisecracking life of the party.
meanings.sent3: The wisecracking joker had everyone in stitches.
meanings.sent4: Her wisecracking friend always brings joy to gatherings.
meanings.sent5: The wisecracking comedian stole the show with his humor.
